servinfo.title: Gear Shift Lever Case Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Dismount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Diesel Engine Model
Remove gear shift lever case assembly (1) from transmission adapter case.

item.ptxt: Install gear shift lever case to transmission adapter case without using sealant for functional check.
Install shift control lever and check to make sure that it shifts smoothly according to shift pattern as shown in figure.

s1.ptxt: Clean mating surface of both adapter case and gear shift lever case (2), and install lever case and new gasket to adapter case, and then tighten new lever case bolts (1) with washer to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Gear shift lever front case bolt

s1.ptxt: Remount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Diesel Engine Model
